import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { createStructuredSelector } from "reselect"; import CheckoutItem from "../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component"; import StripeCheckoutButton from "../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component"; import SubmitButton from "../../components/payment-button/submit-button.styles"; import BillingDetailsFields from "./billing-credentials-fields"; import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal, } from "../../redux/cart/cart.selectors"; import "./checkout.styles.scss"; const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => ( >
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map((cartItem) => ( ))}
TOTAL ${total}
For Testing: NUMBER BRAND CVC DATE 4242424242424242 Visa Any 3 digits Any future date

hola

 ); const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
